title: Distressed Sion relieved, or, The garment of praise for the spirit of heaviness wherein are discovered the grand causes of the churches trouble and misery under the late dismal dispensation : with a compleat history of, and lamentation for those renowned worthies that fell in England by popish rage and cruelty, from the year 1680 to 1688 ... / by Benjamin Keach ...
author: Keach, Benjamin, 1640-1704.
notes: Tightly bound. Pages 1-25 photographed from Yale University Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
